Sterns Printing Chosen by Union Bank & Trust to Manage Print and Marketing Collateral
Richmond, VA, October 14, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Stern’s Printing and Engraving Co., a document management and information solutions company headquartered in suburban Richmond, Virginia, today announced that it has signed a multi-year agreement with Union Bank & Trust to provide printing and promotional items as well as fulfillment services. As part of their business solution, Sterns Printing will help Union Bank & Trust better manage their print and marketing collateral to improve productivity and reduce costs. Union Bank & Trust is the largest community bank headquartered in Virginia.
“It is an honor to be selected by Union Bank & Trust for this long term contract. Union joins an expanding list of clients who rely on Stern’s for superior quality printed and promotional items along with highly efficient and accurate fulfillment services,” said Brian Clark, Executive Vice President and co-founder of Stern’s. “We take pride in building relationships through personalized attention that help companies realize efficiency and better profitability by using our streamlined services.”
About Stern’s Printing
Stern’s Printing and Engraving Co. (www.sternsprint.com) is a document management and information solutions company that helps businesses maximize efficiencies while reducing aggregate print and marketing dollar spend. Stern’s is focused on understanding and meeting customers’ unique challenges with complete solutions ranging from web-based catalogue ordering portals and paper-based business communications to complete document-management systems, workflow consulting and service level agreements. Founded in 1962 and headquartered in suburban Richmond, VA, Stern’s serves industries that include legal, financial services, and manufacturing, and its clients include leading companies across the U.S. and worldwide.
